alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 11:23AM EDT until April 09 at 11:36AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown affecting Gallatin, Union, Hardin and Crittenden Counties. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam affecting Union and Posey Counties. .The river will rise to a crest Thursday afternoon and then fall below flood stage this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 35.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.1 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
